title: 26. "Thank You, Next" Gratitude as a Form of Healing
itunes:title: 26. "Thank You, Next" Gratitude as a Form of Healing
description:
Hey Girl Hey!

 

In this week's episode we talk about how showing gratitude in the present moment can lead to abundance in your life later. We talk about flipping your perspective from pessimism to optimism, how gratitude can help with depression, and ways to incorporate gratitude into a lifestyle

 

Please don't forget to leave a rating and review! :)

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com

 

Click here to get a free preview for my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness
